 50namespace vsip

 52namespace impl
 53{
 54template <typename LHS, typename RHS,
 55	  dimension_type D = LHS::dim,
 56	  typename O = typename Block_layout<LHS>::order_type>
 57struct Loop_fusion_assign;
 58
 59template <typename LHS, typename RHS, typename O>
 60struct Loop_fusion_assign<LHS, RHS, 1, O>
 61{
 62  static void exec(LHS &lhs, RHS const &rhs)
 63  {
 64    expr::evaluate(rhs);
 65
 66    length_type const size = lhs.size(1, 0);
 67    for (index_type i=0; i<size; ++i)
 68      lhs.put(i, rhs.get(i));
 69  }
 70};
 71
 72template <typename LHS, typename RHS>
 73struct Loop_fusion_assign<LHS, RHS, 2, row2_type>
 74{
 75  static void exec(LHS &lhs, RHS const &rhs)
 76  {
 77    expr::evaluate(rhs);
 78
 79    length_type const rows = lhs.size(2, 0);
 80    length_type const cols = lhs.size(2, 1);
 81    for (index_type i=0; i<rows; ++i)
 82      for (index_type j=0; j<cols; ++j)
 83	lhs.put(i, j, rhs.get(i, j));
 84  }
 85};
 86
 87template <typename LHS, typename RHS>
 88struct Loop_fusion_assign<LHS, RHS, 2, col2_type>
 89{
 90  static void exec(LHS &lhs, RHS const &rhs)
 91  {
 92    expr::evaluate(rhs);
 93
 94    length_type const rows = lhs.size(2, 0);
 95    length_type const cols = lhs.size(2, 1);
 96    for (index_type j=0; j<cols; ++j)
 97      for (index_type i=0; i<rows; ++i)
 98	lhs.put(i, j, rhs.get(i, j));
 99  }
100};
101
102template <typename LHS, typename RHS>
103struct Loop_fusion_assign<LHS, RHS, 3, tuple<0,1,2> >
104{
105  static void exec(LHS &lhs, RHS const &rhs)
106  {
107    expr::evaluate(rhs);
108
109    length_type const size0 = lhs.size(3, 0);
110    length_type const size1 = lhs.size(3, 1);
111    length_type const size2 = lhs.size(3, 2);
112
113    for (index_type i=0; i<size0; ++i)
114      for (index_type j=0; j<size1; ++j)
115	for (index_type k=0; k<size2; ++k)
116	  lhs.put(i, j, k, rhs.get(i, j, k));
117  }
118};
119
120template <typename LHS, typename RHS>
121struct Loop_fusion_assign<LHS, RHS, 3, tuple<0,2,1> >
122{
123  static void exec(LHS &lhs, RHS const &rhs)
124  {
125    expr::evaluate(rhs);
126
127    length_type const size0 = lhs.size(3, 0);
128    length_type const size1 = lhs.size(3, 1);
129    length_type const size2 = lhs.size(3, 2);
130
131    for (index_type i=0; i<size0; ++i)
132      for (index_type k=0; k<size2; ++k)
133	for (index_type j=0; j<size1; ++j)
134	  lhs.put(i, j, k, rhs.get(i, j, k));
135  }
136};
137
138template <typename LHS, typename RHS>
139struct Loop_fusion_assign<LHS, RHS, 3, tuple<1,0,2> >
140{
141  static void exec(LHS &lhs, RHS const &rhs)
142  {
143    expr::evaluate(rhs);
144
145    length_type const size0 = lhs.size(3, 0);
146    length_type const size1 = lhs.size(3, 1);
147    length_type const size2 = lhs.size(3, 2);
148
149    for (index_type j=0; j<size1; ++j)
150      for (index_type i=0; i<size0; ++i)
151	for (index_type k=0; k<size2; ++k)
152	  lhs.put(i, j, k, rhs.get(i, j, k));
153  }
154};
155
156template <typename LHS, typename RHS>
157struct Loop_fusion_assign<LHS, RHS, 3, tuple<1,2,0> >
158{
159  static void exec(LHS &lhs, RHS const &rhs)
160  {
161    expr::evaluate(rhs);
162
163    length_type const size0 = lhs.size(3, 0);
164    length_type const size1 = lhs.size(3, 1);
165    length_type const size2 = lhs.size(3, 2);
166
167    for (index_type j=0; j<size1; ++j)
168      for (index_type k=0; k<size2; ++k)
169	for (index_type i=0; i<size0; ++i)
170	  lhs.put(i, j, k, rhs.get(i, j, k));
171  }
172};
173
174template <typename LHS, typename RHS>
175struct Loop_fusion_assign<LHS, RHS, 3, tuple<2,0,1> >
176{
177  static void exec(LHS &lhs, RHS const &rhs)
178  {
179    expr::evaluate(rhs);
180
181    length_type const size0 = lhs.size(3, 0);
182    length_type const size1 = lhs.size(3, 1);
183    length_type const size2 = lhs.size(3, 2);
184
185    for (index_type k=0; k<size2; ++k)
186      for (index_type i=0; i<size0; ++i)
187	for (index_type j=0; j<size1; ++j)
188	  lhs.put(i, j, k, rhs.get(i, j, k));
189  }
190};
191
192template <typename LHS, typename RHS>
193struct Loop_fusion_assign<LHS, RHS, 3, tuple<2,1,0> >
194{
195  static void exec(LHS &lhs, RHS const &rhs)
196  {
197    expr::evaluate(rhs);
198
199    length_type const size0 = lhs.size(3, 0);
200    length_type const size1 = lhs.size(3, 1);
201    length_type const size2 = lhs.size(3, 2);
202
203    for (index_type k=0; k<size2; ++k)
204      for (index_type j=0; j<size1; ++j)
205	for (index_type i=0; i<size0; ++i)
206	  lhs.put(i, j, k, rhs.get(i, j, k));
207  }
208};

213namespace vsip_csl
214{
215namespace dispatcher
216{
217/// Map assignment to profile::dispatch
218template <dimension_type D>
219struct Profile_feature<op::assign<D> >
220{
221  static unsigned int const value = impl::profile::dispatch;
222};
223
224/// Specialize assignment profiling, as the op-counting for that is
225/// handled separately.
226template <dimension_type D, typename LHS, typename RHS, typename B>
227struct Profile_policy<op::assign<D>, void(LHS &, RHS const &), B>
228{
229  typedef impl::profile::Scope<impl::profile::dispatch> scope_type;
230  typedef Evaluator<op::assign<D>, B, void(LHS &, RHS const &)> evaluator_type;
231  Profile_policy(LHS &, RHS const &rhs)
232    : scope(expr::op_name(evaluator_type::name(), rhs),
233	    expr::Ops_per_point<RHS>::value == 0 ?
234	    // If ops_per_point is 0, then assume that operations
235	    // is a copy and record the number of bytes written.
236	    sizeof(typename LHS::value_type) * expr::Ops_per_point<RHS>::size(rhs) :
237	    // Otherwise, record the number of flops.
238	    expr::Ops_per_point<RHS>::value * expr::Ops_per_point<RHS>::size(rhs))
239  {}
240    
241  scope_type scope;  
242};
243
244/// Copy data using memcpy
245template <typename LHS, typename RHS>
246struct Evaluator<op::assign<1>, be::copy, void(LHS &, RHS const &)>
247{
248  static char const *name() { return "Expr_Copy";}
249
250  typedef typename 
251  impl::Adjust_layout_dim<1, typename impl::Block_layout<LHS>::layout_type>::type
252  lhs_layout_type;
253
254  typedef typename 
255  impl::Adjust_layout_dim<1, typename impl::Block_layout<RHS>::layout_type>::type
256  rhs_layout_type;
257
258  static bool const ct_valid = 
259    LHS::dim == 1 && RHS::dim == 1 &&
260    impl::Ext_data_cost<LHS>::value == 0 &&
261    impl::Ext_data_cost<RHS>::value == 0 &&
262    !impl::Is_split_block<LHS>::value &&
263    !impl::Is_split_block<RHS>::value;
264
265  static bool rt_valid(LHS &, RHS const &) { return true;}
266  
267  static void exec(LHS &lhs, RHS const &rhs)
268  {
269    impl::Ext_data<LHS, lhs_layout_type> ext_lhs(lhs, impl::SYNC_OUT);
270    impl::Ext_data<RHS, rhs_layout_type> ext_rhs(rhs, impl::SYNC_IN);
271
272    typename impl::Ext_data<LHS, lhs_layout_type>::raw_ptr_type ptr1 = ext_lhs.data();
273    typename impl::Ext_data<RHS, rhs_layout_type>::raw_ptr_type ptr2 = ext_rhs.data();
274
275    stride_type stride1 = ext_lhs.stride(0);
276    stride_type stride2 = ext_rhs.stride(0);
277    length_type size    = ext_lhs.size(0);
278    assert(size <= ext_rhs.size(0));
279
280    if (impl::Type_equal<typename LHS::value_type,
281	                 typename RHS::value_type>::value &&
282	stride1 == 1 && stride2 == 1)
283    {
284      memcpy(ptr1, ptr2, size*sizeof(typename LHS::value_type));
285    }
286    else
287    {
288      while (size--)
289      {
290	*ptr1 = *ptr2;
291	ptr1 += stride1;
292	ptr2 += stride2;
293      }
294    }
295  }
296};
297
298/// Simple loop-fusion assignment.
299template <dimension_type D, typename LHS, typename RHS>
300struct Evaluator<op::assign<D>, be::loop_fusion, void(LHS &, RHS const &)>
301{
302  static char const *name() { return "Expr_Loop"; }
303  static bool const ct_valid = true;
304  static bool rt_valid(LHS &, RHS const &) { return true;}
305  
306  static void exec(LHS &lhs, RHS const &rhs)
307  { vsip::impl::Loop_fusion_assign<LHS, RHS, D>::exec(lhs, rhs);}
308};
309
310/// Specialization for (non-elementwise) Unary expressions, using the RBO evaluation.
311template <dimension_type D, typename LHS,
312	  template <typename> class Operation,
313	  typename Block>
314struct Evaluator<op::assign<D>, be::rbo_expr,
315		 void(LHS &, expr::Unary<Operation, Block> const &)>
316{
317  typedef expr::Unary<Operation, Block> RHS;
318  typedef typename LHS::value_type lhs_value_type;
319  typedef typename RHS::value_type rhs_value_type;
320
321  static char const *name() { return "op::rbo_expr";}
322
323  static bool const ct_valid = true;
324  static bool rt_valid(LHS &, RHS const &) { return true;}
325  static void exec(LHS &lhs, RHS const &rhs) { rhs.apply(lhs);}
326};
327
328/// Specialization for (non-elementwise) Binary expressions, using the RBO evaluation.
329template <dimension_type D, typename LHS,
330	  template <typename, typename> class Operation,
331	  typename Block1, typename Block2>
332struct Evaluator<op::assign<D>, be::rbo_expr,
333		 void(LHS &, expr::Binary<Operation, Block1, Block2> const &)>
334{
335  typedef expr::Binary<Operation, Block1, Block2> RHS;
336  typedef typename LHS::value_type lhs_value_type;
337  typedef typename RHS::value_type rhs_value_type;
338
339  static char const *name() { return "op::rbo_expr";}
340
341  static bool const ct_valid = true;
342  static bool rt_valid(LHS &, RHS const &) { return true;}
343  static void exec(LHS &lhs, RHS const &rhs) { rhs.apply(lhs);}
344};
345
346/// Specialization for (non-elementwise) Ternary expressions, using the RBO evaluation.
347template <dimension_type D, typename LHS,
348	  template <typename, typename, typename> class Operation,
349	  typename Block1, typename Block2, typename Block3>
350struct Evaluator<op::assign<D>, be::rbo_expr,
351		 void(LHS &, expr::Ternary<Operation, Block1, Block2, Block3> const &)>
352{
353  typedef expr::Ternary<Operation, Block1, Block2, Block3> RHS;
354  typedef typename LHS::value_type lhs_value_type;
355  typedef typename RHS::value_type rhs_value_type;
356
357  static char const *name() { return "op::rbo_expr";}
358
359  static bool const ct_valid = true;
360  static bool rt_valid(LHS &, RHS const &) { return true;}
361  static void exec(LHS &lhs, RHS const &rhs) { rhs.apply(lhs);}
362};
